Interface Dates

public interface Dates
Dates Interface
This interface contains all the methods pertaining to dates and the manipulation thereof.
Version:
1.00, 05 Sept 2021
Author:
Warren Bradley

  • Method Details

    • checkDate

      static String checkDate​(Project proj) throws Exception
      checkDate Method.
      The method is used to see if the date of a project is overdue or not
      Parameters:
      proj - Project object which will have is date checked
      Returns:
      result String indicating if the project is either 'ok' or 'overdue'
      Throws:
      Exception
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • currentDate

      static String currentDate() throws Exception
      currentDate Method.
      The method produces the current date in the desired format as a string
      Returns:
      String of the current date of the format dd/MM/yyyy
      Throws:
      Exception
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • checkDateFormat

      static String checkDateFormat​(Scanner sc)
      checkDateFormat Method.
      The method is used to check the user entered the correct date format
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to take in user inputs
      Returns:
      date String of the entered date
      Since:
      version 1.00
